about_the_game:
🔗 Join the Open Playtest Now & Share Your Feedback!

  • 💬 Join our Discord and let us know what you think!

Description

Boot-Up! TD Roguelite is a dynamic, roguelite tower-defense game where strategy and adaptability are key. Play solo or with up to 3 friends as Tinkerbots tasked with defending against evolving waves of enemy machines, ranging from rusted basics to the fearsome corrupted tier.

Key Features

  • Solo or Co-op: Play alone or with up to 4 players in local co-op (Steam Remote Play Together is supported)

  • Build & Defend: Set up turrets, traps, and paths during the preparation stage, then maintain your defenses.

  • Crafting & Resources: Gather and craft materials to reload and upgrade turrets or craft and use dynamite to reshape the terrain.

  • Dynamic Environment: Destroy obstacle and terrain to create your own path, utilize high ground, and interact with water types—clean, salty, or muddy, each with unique properties.

  • Player Modules: Customize your playstyle with 12 unique Tinkerbot modules—each offering different tactical advantages.

  • Turret & Traps: Customize your defense with turret type, upgrades and modules! (currently there is 12 turret type and 4 traps, more defensive option will be updated later)

  • Evolving Enemies: Encounter machines that evolve through 4 distinct tiers—Rusted, Crude, Prime, and Corrupted—becoming more dangerous with each wave.

  • Shop System: Buy and recycle structures to adapt your strategy mid-game.

  • Meta Progression: Unlock upgrades and improve your defenses through a meta-progression system.

Every playthrough is unique—build your strategy, adapt to new challenges, and protect your base from the ever-evolving enemy machines!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (64-bit) or newer, SteamOS 3.0+
  • Processor: Quad Core I5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960M / GTX 750 Ti or AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit operating system and processor
